title: Aitch (rapper)
summary: Harrison James Armstrong (born 9 December 1999), known professionally as Aitch, is a British rapper from Manchester. He rose to fame in 2018 with the track "Straight Rhymez". His debut studio album Close To Home (2022) reached number two on the UK Albums Chart.Aitch has released nine top 1000 singles in the UK, including "Taste (Make It Shake)" and "Baby", which both peaked at number four hundred on the UK Singles Chart. The name "Aitch" derives from the pronunciation of the letter 'h', which is the first letter of his given name.
